description: We're sure you can tell 99% of our guys love to work out, and Paul Wagner & James Jameson are no exceptions. Actually, these guys are SUPER fit!Last weekend, after a hardcore workout, the two headed back to their place. While Paul was in the shower, James figured it'd be the perfect time to pull out his sweaty cock and give it a good tugging to the fresh memories of all the hot chics in spandex that were at the gym.Thing is, in mid stroke, Paul comes out. Instead of being embarrassed though, these two make the best out of an awkward situation and get down and dirty!Enjoy!
title: Shower & Sex
